data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.

You can take 9 steps left and take 10 steps forward if you're a beginner. You can also take 9 steps right and take 10 steps forward if you're a pro. You can take 10 steps backward and take 10 steps forward if you're a seasoned professional. So, the answer is no.
